turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I think Im feeling coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I can order a coffee for pick up for you, would you like to begin?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Im feeling Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: The closest starbucks is on tates creek drive, would you like to order from there?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah that works.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Id like a caramel macciato please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Grande

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Would you like that hot or cold?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hot please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Any special requests or additions?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, Id want an extra shot of expresso in it too!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have one grande caramel macciato with an extra shot of espresso in it for pickup. What time do you plan on getting it.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Ill probably leave here in an hour.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, I have the order set to go through in an hour. Would you like to pay with your card on file?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah thats fine.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Your coffee will be ready in about an hour. Is there anything else I can help you with today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, thats all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, enjoy your coffee.
